DOC.brief_title: Use Color Doppler Routine Examination Fetal Heart Second Trimester
DOC.detailed_description: Almost woman Norway routine ultrasound examination second trimester , however , detection rate heart defect around 50 % . In study use color Doppler three different level fetal heart ; four chamber view , outlet aorta level great artery . All heart defect delivery record compare ultrasound finding .
